name: Liga Zebra by American Viking - Gordo
additionalNotes: The Liga Zebra is a carefully selected blend of Ecuadorian, Honduran, & Dominican tobaccos that combines a robust flavor profile (with notes of cedar, cream, earth, and nuts) with a smooth finish and lots of smoke output. American Viking Cigars – Blended in a combination of Honduran, Dominican, and Ecuadorian tobaccos, The Zebra is known for its creamy smoothness and earthy depth. OGT rates this beautiful cigar as one of the best barber poles you’ll try. The Zebra has a balanced flavor profile of Spanish Cedar, Banana nut bread, Almonds, and a sweet earthiness.
